title: LCSO: Death of Toney teen being treated as accidental shooting
content:
The Wednesday shooting death of a teenager in Toney is being treated as accidental, an official said.
Limestone County Sheriff's Office Spokesman Stephen Young said the accident occurred at a residence on Alabama 251. He said investigators determined the 17-year-old male was playing with a handgun and accidentally shot himself once. He was pronounced dead at the scene.
The sheriff's office did not release the name of the victim because of his age. Young said there would be no further information about the case at this time.
